items.sentence: Tom told me he thought that Mary would be jealous.
Tom told me he thought that Mary would be furious.
Tom told me he thought that Mary would be at home.
Let's not make things worse than they already are.
It took Tom a while to understand what Mary meant.
There are some people I just don't get along with.
Tom texted Mary every thirty minutes all day long.
May I have your name and telephone number, please?
One of my favorite tunes was playing on the radio.
There's an old castle at the foot of the mountain.
